abstract: A bar item that provides a slider control for choosing a value in a range.

# NSSliderTouchBarItem

**Class**

A bar item that provides a slider control for choosing a value in a range.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSSliderTouchBarItem
```

## Configuring the slider

- **slider**: The slider displayed by the bar item.
- **label**: The text displayed alongside the slider.
- **view**

## Configuring slider accessories

- **minimumValueAccessory**: The accessory that appears at the end of the slider with the minimum value.
- **maximumValueAccessory**: The accessory that appears at the end of the slider with the maximum value.
- **valueAccessoryWidth**: The width of the value accessories that appear at either end of the slider.

## Managing the slider’s value

- **minimumSliderWidth**: The minimum width of the slider’s track.
- **maximumSliderWidth**: The maximum width of the slider’s track.
- **doubleValue**: The double value of the slider.

## Handling slider interaction

- **target**: An object that is notified when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.
- **action**: The selector on the target object that is invoked when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.

## Configuring bar customization

- **customizationLabel**: The user-visible string identifying this item during bar customization.

## Touch Bar items

- **NSTouchBarItem**: A UI control shown in the Touch Bar on supported models of MacBook Pro.
- **NSCandidateListTouchBarItem**: A bar item that, along with its delegate, provides a list of textual suggestions for the current text view.
- **NSColorPickerTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a system-defined color picker.
- **NSCustomTouchBarItem**: A bar item that contains a responder of your choice, such as a view, a button, or a scrubber.
- **NSGroupTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a bar to contain other items.
- **NSPopoverTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a two-state control that can expand into its second state, showing the contents of a bar that it owns.
- **NSSharingServicePickerTouchBarItem**: A bar item that, along with its delegate, provides a list of objects eligible for sharing.
- **NSStepperTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a stepper control for incrementing or decrementing a value.
- **NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions**: An object that specifies how user interface elements resize themselves when space is constrained.
- **NSButtonTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a button.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a picker control with multiple options.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation**: Constants that specify display styles for picker bar items.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.SelectionMode**: Constants that specify selection modes for picker bar items.

## Inherits From

- NSTouchBarItem

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
